name: Groovy Bounce Adventures
description:
• Move and bounce around the dance floor with the arrow keys.
  • Fire powerups with the spacebar.
  • Select powerups from the inventory with numbers 1-3 on the keyboard.
  • Catch and eat as much food as possible while avoiding the bouncers! (The little cubic guys in suits.)

(Sondre Agledahl's submission for the second round of the 2017 Rising Star competition. Repository available at https://bitbucket.org/colonelsalt/sfas2017.)
